movie.title: Away
movie.description_intro: A story set in the north English seaside town of Blackpool and centered on two kindred spirits who form an unlikely friendship.
movie.description_full: A story set in the north English seaside town of Blackpool and centered on two kindred spirits who form an unlikely friendship.

movies.title: Contempt
movies.summary: Paul Javal is a writer who is hired to make a script for a new movie about Ulysses more commercial, which is to be directed by Fritz Lang and produced by Jeremy Prokosch. But because he let his wife Camille drive with Prokosch and he is late, she believes, he uses her as a sort of present for Prokosch to get get a better payment. So the relationship ends.

movies.title: Good Luck Charlie, It's Christmas!
movies.summary: Idiocy strikes when a woman and her daughter get separated from their family during the holidays.
movies.description_full: Idiocy strikes when a woman and her daughter get separated from their family during the holidays.
movies.synopsis: Idiocy strikes when a woman and her daughter get separated from their family during the holidays.

movies.title: Dreams
movies.summary: This is essentially eight separate short films, though with some overlaps in terms of characters and thematic material - chiefly that of man's relationship with his environment. 'Sunshine Through The Rain': a young boy is told not to go out on the day when both weather conditions occur, because that's when the foxes hold their wedding procession, which could have fatal consequences for those who witness it. 'The Peach Orchard': the same young boy encounters the spirits of the peach trees that have been cut down by heartless humans. 'The Blizzard': a team of mountaineers are saved from a blizzard by spiritual intervention. 'The Tunnel': a man encounters the ghosts of an army platoon, whose deaths he was responsible for. 'Crows': an art student encounters 'Vincent Van Gogh' and enters the world of his paintings. 'Mount Fuji in Red': nuclear meltdown threatens the devastation of Japan. 'The Weeping Demon': a portrait of a post-nuclear world populated by human mutations. 'Village of the ...

movies.title: Always
movies.summary: Pete Sandich and buddy Al Yackey are daredevil aerial forest-fire fighters. Pete finds True Love with Dorinda but won't give up the job. When he takes one risk too many, Dorinda faces deep grief and cannot easily put her life back together.
movies.description_full: Pete Sandich and buddy Al Yackey are daredevil aerial forest-fire fighters. Pete finds True Love with Dorinda but won't give up the job. When he takes one risk too many, Dorinda faces deep grief and cannot easily put her life back together.
